# [Interview #954: AMOL Signing Report - AndrewB, Entry #11](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=954#11)

#### Question

Why did we not see
*cuendillar*
made into chain mail or shields?

#### Brandon Sanderson

BWS does not know if something like this was ever done at some point in the history of WoT.
